comments.body: Suggestion: maybe verify the run ID returned by `mlflow_run` as well? e.g. via `expect_equal(mlflow_run("project"), "48734e7e2e8f44228a11c0c2cbcdc8b0")` here? I guess interestingly R differs from Python here, we may eventually want to break this API & return something akin to Python's [SubmittedRun](https://www.mlflow.org/docs/latest/python_api/mlflow.projects.html#mlflow.projects.SubmittedRun) object from `mlflow_run` in R instead of a run_uuid.
The returned run id is hardcoded. I don't think there is a need to test we got it.
